server.name: io.github.aahl/mcp-notify
server.description: MCP Server for notify to Weixin, Telegram, Bark, Lark, Feishu, DingTalk
server.title: Notify MCP Server

environmentVariables.description: The default key for the WeWork group robot can also be specified in the prompt
environmentVariables.name: WEWORK_BOT_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Agent ID of WeWork Application, Default: 1000002
environmentVariables.name: WEWORK_APP_AGENTID

environmentVariables.description: Default recipient user ID in WeWork, Default: @all
environmentVariables.name: WEWORK_APP_TOUSER

environmentVariables.description: Access token of DingTalk Robot, Can also be specified in the prompt
environmentVariables.name: DINGTALK_BOT_KEY

environmentVariables.description: The key of Lark Robot, Can also be specified in the prompt
environmentVariables.name: LARK_BOT_KEY

environmentVariables.description: The key of Feishu Robot, Can also be specified in the prompt
environmentVariables.name: FEISHU_BOT_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Telegram Default Chat ID, Can also be specified in the prompt
environmentVariables.name: TELEGRAM_DEFAULT_CHAT

environmentVariables.description: Default PushPlus token, Can also be specified in the prompt
environmentVariables.name: PUSH_PLUS_TOKEN
